item.title: 加拿大统计局解决贸易数据延迟后的网络中断问题
item.description: 加拿大统计局的网站在周二发生故障导致国际贸易数据延迟半小时后已恢复正常。【原文：Statistics Canada’s website is back to normal following an outage that led to the half-hour delay of international trade data on Tuesday.】

item.title: 芝加哥市议会推迟 15 亿美元再融资投票
item.description: 芝加哥市议会周三推迟了对市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）提出的 15 亿美元债券交易的投票。【原文：The Chicago City Council on Wednesday deferred a vote on Mayor Brandon Johnson’s proposed $1.5 billion bond deal, a transaction intended to help close back-to-back shortfalls.】

item.title: B.莱利贷款人每周在修订后的贷款中获得最新流动性信息
item.description: B.Riley Financial Inc. 的贷款人对该公司的财务状况有了更多的监督，包括每周更新其流动性和部分交易情况，以努力使这家亏损的投资公司摆脱困境。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc.’s lenders are getting more oversight of the company’s finances, including weekly updates on its liquidity and some of its dealmaking amid efforts to pull the money-losing investment firm out of its tailspin.】

item.title: 500 亿美元基金经理 Impax 称英伟达价值仍被低估
item.description: 今年早些时候，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）遭遇大幅抛售，而 Impax Asset Management 则悄然抓住这一时机，增持了其长期以来一直后悔没有持有的股份。【原文：As Nvidia Corp. found itself the target of a deep selloff earlier this year, Impax Asset Management was quietly seizing the moment to build a stake it had long regretted not owning.】

item.title: 苹果公司乔布斯和库克时代的关键高管丹-里奇奥即将退休
item.description: 苹果公司的丹-里奇奥（Dan Riccio）即将退休，他负责监督公司在混合现实头戴设备领域的推进工作，此前曾担任苹果公司的硬件工程主管。【原文：Apple Inc.’s Dan Riccio, who oversaw the company’s push into mixed-reality headsets and previously served as its hardware engineering chief, is retiring.】

item.title: Pinnacle 支持的小盘股经理人在朱棣文的加拿大交易中大获全胜
item.description: 加拿大投资公司 Langdon Equity Partners Ltd. 成为 Blackstone 长期交易员 Chinh Chu 支持的交易的大赢家之一。【原文：Canadian investment firm Langdon Equity Partners Ltd. has emerged as one of the big winners from a deal backed by longtime Blackstone dealmaker Chinh Chu.】

item.title: 美联储降息希望在 CPI 前减弱，国债收益率上升
item.description: 美国国债收益率上升，原因是在周四公布通胀数据之前，交易员放弃了对美联储今年进一步降息的押注。【原文：US Treasury yields rose as traders nixed bets on additional Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year ahead of inflation data to be released on Thursday.】

item.title: 印度最大企业集团的创始人拉坦-塔塔逝世，享年 86 岁
item.description: 拉坦-塔塔（Ratan Tata）是一位商人，他继承了印度历史最悠久的企业集团之一，并通过一系列引人注目的交易将其转变为一个全球帝国。享年 86 岁。【原文：Ratan Tata, the businessman who inherited one of India’s oldest conglomerates and transformed it through a string of eye-catching deals into a global empire, has died. He was 86.】

item.title: 里约以适者生存的心态进军锂业
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Plc）在锂电池金属价格断崖式暴跌后大举进军锂市场，打赌自己可以建立一个庞大、低成本的矿山组合，从而战胜实力较弱的竞争对手。【原文：Rio Tinto Plc is muscling in on the lithium market after a precipitous price collapse for the battery metal, betting it can build a portfolio of huge, low-cost mines that will outlast weaker rivals.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗舰公司希望通过出售股份筹集 5 亿美元资金
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的旗舰公司寻求通过向机构出售股份筹集约 5 亿美元资金，这标志着该公司在 2023 年遭遇卖空报告凋零后重返股权筹资领域。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani’s flagship firm seeks to raise about $500 million through a share sale to institutions, marking a return to equity fundraising after a withering short-seller report in 2023.】

item.title: 套现潮一代吸引投资者，澳大利亚年轻人承担起重任
item.description: 投资者正在抢购面向全国套现退休人员的澳大利亚股票，而避开面向年轻家庭的公司，这是代际财富鸿沟不断扩大的一种表现。【原文：Investors are snapping up Australian stocks geared to the nation’s cashed-up retirees while shunning firms exposed to younger households, in a play on a widening intergenerational wealth divide.】

item.title: 投资者呼吁在 Europastry IPO 中给予同行更大折扣
item.description: Europastry SA 已停止首次公开募股，该公司的一位潜在投资者呼吁，在定价上应比该公司的一家上市同行有更严格的折扣。【原文：A prospective investor in Europastry SA’s halted initial public offering called for a tighter pricing discount to one of the company’s listed peers.】

item.title: 如果评级被降至垃圾级，波音将面临 1 亿美元的额外利息成本
item.description: 如果波音公司的信用评级被下调至垃圾级，该公司的年利息成本将至少增加 1 亿美元，这将使其在应对停滞不前的工会谈判和寻求充实新资本的过程中雪上加霜。【原文：Boeing Co.’s annual interest costs could rise by at least $100 million if its credit rating is cut to junk, adding to its troubles as it navigates stalled union talks and seeks to shore up fresh capital.】

item.title: 刚果希望摆脱中国对其矿业的主导地位
item.description: 刚果民主共和国最高矿业官员表示，该国正在为其世界级的主要金属矿藏寻求新的投资者，因为该国希望实现目前由中国主导的矿业所有权多元化。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo’s top mining official said the country is courting new investors for its world-class deposits of key metals as it looks to diversify ownership in its industry, which is currently dominated by China.】

item.title: 不着陆是好消息，但要注意市场波动
item.description: 你会认为，美国经济再次摆脱衰退担忧的迹象是件好事。事实的确如此。但同时也带来了市场波动。这是因为，正如债券巨头 Pimco 前首席执行官穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安所说，"这个市场在如何看待利率方面缺乏锚"。如果你能抛开债券的波动（这种波动可能会在周四进一步加剧）不谈，整体而言，股票的前景依然光明，但债券的前景就不那么光明了。【原文：You’d think signs that the US economy has once again defied recession worries would be a good thing. And it is. But it comes with a side dose of market volatility. That’s because, as the former CEO of bond giant Pimco Mohamed El-Erian puts it, “this market lacks anchors when it comes to how it sees the interest rates.” If you can look past the bond volatility, which may ramp up further as soon as Thursday, the outlook still remains bright overall because of stocks, though less so for bonds.】

item.title: 飓风米尔顿威胁佛罗里达州 300 亿美元市政债务
item.description: 根据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）的分析，飓风米尔顿正向佛罗里达州袭来，威胁着坦帕湾地区的大规模风暴潮，大约 300 亿美元的市政债务面临风险。【原文：As Hurricane Milton barrels toward Florida threatening massive storm surges in the Tampa Bay area, roughly $30 billion of municipal debt is at risk, according to an analysis from Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: C.D. Howe 称加拿大资本收益税将减少收入
item.description: 一家研究机构称，加拿大提高资本收益纳入税率的决定不太可能像贾斯汀-特鲁多政府预期的那样产生大量现金。【原文：Canada’s decision to increase the capital gains inclusion rate is unlikely to generate as much cash as Justin Trudeau’s government expects, a research group says.】

item.title: 我不是中本聪"，HBO 声称创造比特币的人说
item.description: 软件开发人员彼得-托德（Peter Todd）希望向 HBO 及其一部新电影的观众传达一个信息：比特币不是他发明的。【原文：Software developer Peter Todd wants to send a message to HBO and viewers of one of its new films: He didn’t invent Bitcoin.】

item.title: 即使出售谈判仍在继续，Stada 所有者仍要求进行 IPO 投标
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，Stada Arzneimittel AG 公司的私募股权所有者正在寻求扩大银行阵容，以应对这家德国仿制药生产商可能进行的首次公开募股，尽管有关出售给收购公司 GTCR 的谈判仍在继续。【原文：Stada Arzneimittel AG’s private equity owners are looking to expand the bank lineup for a potential initial public offering of the German generic drugmaker, people familiar with the matter said, even as negotiations over a sale to buyout firm GTCR continue.】

item.title: 大都会队季后赛的胜利让史蒂夫-科恩走向棒球的辉煌
item.description: 周二，亿万富翁史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）站在花旗球场（Citi Field）外迎接球迷，与孩子们合影留念，并高呼 "大都会加油"（Let's Go Mets），这是他所拥有的美国职业棒球大联盟球队的口号。【原文：Billionaire Steve Cohen stood outside Citi Field Tuesday greeting fans, posing for photos with kids and saying “Let’s Go Mets,” the rallying cry of the Major League Baseball team he owns.】

item.title: 世界银行称拉美财政政策面临通胀风险
item.description: 据世界银行称，随着拉美地区各国政府通过增加公共开支来促进经济增长，财政失衡可能会威胁到拉美地区在抑制通货膨胀方面取得的成功。【原文：Fiscal imbalances could threaten Latin America’s success in taming inflation, as governments across the region boost growth through more public spending, according to the World Bank.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 首席执行官赵称监管阻碍了 IPO
item.description: Citadel Securities LLC 首席执行官赵鹏（Peng Zhao）说，美国企业界监管过多的前景阻碍了企业上市；他还将此作为该做市商目前不考虑上市的一个原因。【原文：Citadel Securities LLC Chief Executive Officer Peng Zhao said the prospect of too much regulation in corporate America is deterring firms from going public — which he also cited as a reason why the market-maker isn’t considering the move right now.】

item.title: 总统和首席执行官被调查，厄瓜多尔石油公司债券销售推迟
item.description: 在哥伦比亚选举委员会对总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）和这家国营石油公司的高层展开调查后，Ecopetrol SA 的债券销售悬而未决。【原文：A bond sale from Ecopetrol SA is up in the air after Colombia’s electoral council opened an investigation into President Gustavo Petro and the state-oil company’s top boss.】

item.title: 尽管有可用的修复程序，黑客仍然瞄准过时的软件漏洞
item.description:
美国网络审查机构近三年前就对开源 Log4j 漏洞发出了警告。【原文：

US cyber review warned of open source Log4j vulnerability nearly three years ago. 

】

item.title: 您的钱放在金融科技公司到底有多安全？
item.description: 想象一下，你把存款存入一家数字银行，不假思索，有一天一觉醒来却发现无法使用。今年早些时候，金融科技初创公司Synapse Financial Technologies Inc.申请破产保护，导致多达9500万美元的客户资金丢失，而这正是1000多万终端用户遭遇的噩梦般的场景。这家安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）支持的初创公司成立于 2014 年，是过去几年中出现的数千家公司之一。【原文：Imagine putting your savings into a digital bank, not thinking about it, and waking up one day to find it inaccessible. That nightmarish scenario is exactly what happened to more than 10 million end users earlier this year when fintech startup Synapse Financial Technologies Inc. filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy – and left as much as $95 million worth of customer funds missing. Founded in 2014, the Andreessen Horowitz-backed startup was one of thousands of companies that have emerged over the last】

item.title: 墨西哥谢因鲍姆将扩大对石油和电力巨头的控制权
item.description: 根据有望获得批准的立法，墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆将获得对墨西哥石油公司（Pemex）和国家电力公司更多的控制权。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum would gain increased control over Pemex and the national electricity utility under legislation that’s expected to win approval.】

item.title: 尽管首次公开募股 "奇缺"，华尔街的 SPAC 机器仍在运转
item.description: 即使市场连续数月反弹，传统首次公开募股的步伐仍落后于银行家们的预期。摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）将缺乏交易称为 "奇怪"，然后将原因归咎于成本和繁文缛节。【原文：Even with markets rallying for months, the pace of traditional initial public offerings is behind what bankers expected. JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon called the lack of deals “odd” before blaming costs and red tape.】

item.title: 北欧航空公司 SAS 加入连接欧洲与中国的航班大军
item.description: SAS AB 将放弃哥本哈根至上海的航线，这家北欧航空公司将加入越来越多的欧洲航空公司的行列，退出世界第二大航空市场。【原文：SAS AB is giving up its service from Copenhagen to Shanghai, as the Nordic airline joins a growing list of European airlines retreating from the world’s second-biggest aviation market.】

item.title: 沃尔玛墨西哥分公司称针对其的反垄断调查存在缺陷
item.description: Wal-Mart de México SAB 公司高管批评了对该零售商涉嫌垄断行为进行的长期反垄断调查，并补充说预计本月底会有结果。【原文：Wal-Mart de México SAB executives criticized a long-running antitrust probe into the retailer’s alleged monopolistic practices, adding that a resolution is expected by the end of this month.】

item.title: Partners 集团支持的幼儿园上市后股价攀升 12
item.description: KinderCare Learning Cos.在首次公开募股中筹集了 5.76 亿美元，发行价接近市场定价区间的底线，之后该公司股价上涨了 12%。【原文：KinderCare Learning Cos. shares rose 12% after the company raised $576 million in an initial public offering priced toward the bottom of a marketed range.】
